tree

Class TreeWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ui.PanelRunner
              • tree.TreeWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, IUserInterface.TabbedPaneActivator

    public class TreeWorker
extends PanelRunner
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Addresses limitations of the old concurrent state machine approach. Instead, both tree FSM and game FSM are combined but may both operate on the same tree as other of the new FSM_Trees The idea is to run many instances of this class in parallel.
    Author:
    matt
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setRoot

        public void setRoot(Node rootNode)
        Set the root node to work from. Does not have to be the overall tree root. Must be assigned, however. Must still startWorker() to get things rolling.
        Parameters:
        rootNode - Root node that this worker expands from.

      • setSampler

        public void setSampler(ISampler sampler)
        Set which sampler is used. Defaults to Sampler_Random. Clones when reassigned.

      • setSaver

        public void setSaver(IDataSaver saver)
        Set which saver to use. Defaults to no saving, Sampler_Null. Clones when reassigned.

      • run

        public void run()
        Finite state machine loop. Runnable.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

        public State getInitialState()
        QWOP initial condition. Good way to give the root node a state.

        public void terminateWorker()
        Terminate this worker after it's done with it's current task.

      • pauseWorker

        public void pauseWorker()
        Pause what the worker is doing. Good for changing objectives and samplers, etc.

      • startWorker

        public void startWorker()
        Unpause what the worker is doing. Use once objectives have been set.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Check if this runner is done or not.

        public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
